archetypes.title: Brand Archetypes
archetypes.subtitle: Discover the personality that defines your brand

ruler.name: The Ruler
ruler.description: Brand that represents power, stability and leadership. Ideal for companies seeking to project authority and excellence. Examples: Mercedes-Benz, Rolex, Microsoft.

explorer.name: The Explorer
explorer.description: Adventurous brand that inspires individuality and authenticity. Perfect for businesses that value innovation and experience. Examples: Jeep, Patagonia, Red Bull.

sage.name: The Sage
sage.description: Brand that educates and shares wisdom. For companies seeking to be a trusted source of information. Examples: Google, BBC, Harvard.

hero.name: The Hero
hero.description: Brand that inspires overcoming challenges. Ideal for products that help improve performance. Examples: Nike, Gatorade, FedEx.

outlaw.name: The Outlaw
outlaw.description: Disruptive brand that challenges the status quo. For businesses that break rules and create new categories. Examples: Harley-Davidson, Virgin, Diesel.

magician.name: The Magician
magician.description: Brand that makes dreams come true. Perfect for products that offer unique experiences. Examples: Disney, Apple, MasterCard.

everyman.name: The Everyman
everyman.description: Accessible and reliable brand. Ideal for companies that prioritize human connection. Examples: IKEA, Levi's, Target.

lover.name: The Lover
lover.description: Sensory and emotional brand. For businesses that create pleasurable experiences. Examples: Victoria's Secret, Godiva, Alfa Romeo.

jester.name: The Jester
jester.description: Fun brand that brightens the day. Perfect for products that don't take themselves too seriously. Examples: M&M's, Old Spice, Ben & Jerry's.

caregiver.name: The Caregiver
caregiver.description: Compassionate and generous brand. Ideal for companies focused on well-being. Examples: Johnson & Johnson, Volvo, UNICEF.

creator.name: The Creator
creator.description: Imaginative brand that fosters creativity. For businesses that value originality. Examples: Adobe, Lego, Crayola.

innocent.name: The Innocent
innocent.description: Optimistic and pure brand. Ideal for products that offer nostalgia and positivity. Examples: Coca-Cola, Dove, McDonald's.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Energy Healer & Spiritual Guide
about.description: Zuzana ErdÃ¶sovÃ¡ is a certified Past Life Regression therapist, energy healer trained in the Emotion Code, Body Code, and Belief Code methods, a Star Magic Healing facilitator Level 2, and a channeler of Ilyari (somatic transmission of light codes). As a former university researcher with two doctorates in Linguistics and Latin American Studies, her vocation and passion lie in exploring both the intuitive and scientific aspects of energy healing. Zuzana is also the author of numerous scientific articles, book chapters, and six solo-authored books, including "Thinking Otherness: The Mexican Indigenous Community Through Five Sources of Knowledge" and "Evolved Proverbs: Updated Wisdom for The Life You Truly Want to Live." She is also a translator, singer, and lyricist, and a great enthusiast of horses. She enjoys speaking and working in several languages (English, Spanish, and her native Czech), and living in intercultural environments surrounded by beautiful nature.

books.title: My Books
books.subtitle: Words that illuminate the path to healing and self-discovery. Each book is a gift, freely shared with those who seek wisdom.

store.title: Store
store.subtitle: Transformative energy healing sessions designed to help you release what no longer serves you and step into your highest potential.

productDetail.notesPlaceholder: Any specific concerns or questions you'd like to address during the session...
productDetail.termsText: By booking, you agree to our terms and conditions. You'll receive a confirmation email with session details.

emotionCode.name: Emotion Code Session
emotionCode.description: Release trapped emotions that may be creating physical and emotional problems.
emotionCode.fullDescription: The Emotion Code is a powerful and simple method developed by Dr. Bradley Nelson to identify and release trapped emotions. These trapped emotions are made of energy, and they can create pain, malfunction, and disease. They can also block you from love, happiness and success.
benefits: Release emotional baggage from past events
whatToExpect: Initial consultation to understand your concerns
Muscle testing to identify trapped emotions
Gentle release of trapped emotions using magnets
idealFor: Individuals on a path of self-discovery
Anyone ready to release the past

faq.question: How many sessions will I need?
faq.answer: This varies by individual. Some people experience significant shifts in one session, while others benefit from a series of sessions. We'll discuss your progress and needs during each session.

faq.question: Is this done in person or remotely?
faq.answer: Sessions can be done both in person and remotely via video call. Energy work is not limited by distance, and remote sessions are equally effective.

faq.question: What should I do to prepare?
faq.answer: Come with an open mind and heart. Stay hydrated before and after the session. It's helpful to have specific issues or concerns you'd like to address.

bodyCode.name: Body Code Session
bodyCode.description: Discover and correct imbalances in the body.
bodyCode.fullDescription: The Body Code is a sophisticated and comprehensive energy healing technique designed to identify and correct imbalances in six key areas: Energies, Circuits & Systems, Toxins, Pathogens, Misalignments, and Nutrition & Lifestyle.
benefits: Balance energy systems throughout the body
Address root causes of physical issues
idealFor: Those committed to deep healing work

faq.question: How is this different from Emotion Code?
faq.answer: While Emotion Code focuses specifically on trapped emotions, Body Code addresses six different types of imbalances including emotions, structural issues, toxins, pathogens, and more. It's a more comprehensive system.

faq.question: Can this replace medical treatment?
faq.answer: Body Code is a complementary healing modality and should not replace medical care. Always consult with your healthcare provider for medical concerns.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: Hear from those who have experienced transformation

testimonial1.text: I gave myself completely to the past life experience. Zuzana inspired me a lot of confidence, I felt at all times her professionalism and the love she gives. The experience is so real - I could see in great detail the stages of a previous life and feel the contact with my spiritual guide. At the end I was very ecstatic with the experience, I just wanted it to have an impact on me. To this day I still reflect on what I experienced. I am able to understand many aspects of my current life, my purpose, and I converse with my spirit guide on a daily basis. I only have words of gratitude.
testimonial1.name: Rodrigo J.

testimonial2.text: With great attention, Zuzana investigated until she reached the very roots of my inner imbalance. It was surprising for me to feel the energy of the imbalances leaving my body! The ramifications were so complex that one could get lost, but Zuzana was asking all the right questions and seeing the underlying links with great insight. For certain issues, the result was immediate, while others took several weeks to manifest. It is incredible to witness all the changes that entered my life after the sessions. My past cleared and new paths were opened. I am grateful to Zuzana for her empathy, passion and professional approach that makes everything possible.
testimonial2.name: Marie D.

testimonial3.text: I am the owner of Sid, a 9 year old Jack Russell terrier. He is very active and playful despite his age, but suddenly, he lost interest in fetching the ball and going for walks. He would just lie around, indifferent to his surroundings. It was breaking my heart to see him like this, so I contacted Zuzana. It was amazing to watch her work with Sid and it was even more incredible to see the results several days later. Sid's condition gradually returned to normal: his energy was back. If Sid needs help in the future, I would love to have Zuzana working on him again. I even requested a session for myself!
testimonial3.name: Daniela and Sid

personalCreation.title: PERSONAL CREATION
personalCreation.intro: This is where I share my writing and music.
personalCreation.paragraph1: When I create, I become a sequence of connections, a current capable of sending me something my other selves already know. In that flow, focus is so complete that I forget myself within it, until it releases me and I notice it â€” but it's already gone.
personalCreation.paragraph2: It's the moment when the observing part of my self glimpses the traces of that other part, the one who created without the need to observe.
personalCreation.quote: Therein lies the strange tension: Consciousness in flow is blind, because it sees through everything. Whereas consciousness at a distance is watchful, but only of the memory of that flow.

hero.description: Discover transformative healing modalities that work at the energetic level to release trapped emotions, correct imbalances, and reprogram limiting beliefs.

emotionBodyBelief.title: Emotion, Body & Belief
emotionBodyBelief.intro: Emotion Code, Body Code and Belief Code are globally established energy healing methods developed since the 1990s by Dr. Bradley Nelson and his team in the USA.
emotionBodyBelief.intro2: The Codes allow us to work with the deepest layers of your being â€” those that know they need help and, above all, what kind of help they require.
emotionBodyBelief.intro3: My role is to ask the right questions, receive the answers, and act according to the guidance that comes through, releasing from your field, body, and mind whatever is creating imbalance. In this way, we address and heal the root cause of your issue.
emotionBodyBelief.intro4: When your energetic blueprint comes into alignment, your physical body naturally heals.
emotionBodyBelief.subtitle: What can the Codes do for you?

emotionCode.title: EMOTION CODE
emotionCode.description: The EMOTION CODE performs a deep cleansing of the repressed emotions you unconsciously carry with you. This emotional baggage comes from old or recent wounds and traumas, it can be inherited or absorbed from others, and it continuously affects your mental state and physical health. It is estimated that around 80% of energetic imbalances in human beings are caused by unprocessed emotions.
emotionCode.benefit: Receiving an Emotion Code session is like finally releasing a heavy backpack you've been carrying for a long time, allowing your whole being to straighten, breathe, and heal.

bodyCode.title: BODY CODE
bodyCode.description: The BODY CODE corrects a multitude of energetic imbalances in your body and mind, promoting overall harmonization of your organism at all levels. A balanced, energetically clean body is capable of performing powerful healing processes and regeneration.
bodyCode.benefit: A Body Code session is like thoroughly cleaning and organizing a room, allowing fresh air to circulate again!

beliefCode.title: BELIEF CODE
beliefCode.description: The BELIEF CODE reprograms negative subconscious beliefs that limit your thoughts, feelings, and actions. When these mental programs are neutralized together with the trauma that created them, subconscious blocks dissolve and a new path opens in your life. Once you align your subconscious truth (the inner programming) with your conscious will (what you truly want in life), you can finally guide your life in the right direction.
beliefCode.benefit: A Belief Code session is like weeding the garden of your mind and allowing healthy thought patterns to take root, which then reflect naturally in your daily feelings and actions.

pastLife.title: Past Life
pastLife.intro: Past life regressions allow you to regain memories of a previous existence that are still impacting your present life.
pastLife.paragraph1: Many of us suffer from traumas that haven't been caused by anything in our present life and seek healing. During a regression, we bring these old wounds into awareness and work constructively with them until the trauma is processed and released.
pastLife.paragraph2: Additionally, many people undergo past life regressions simply to remember who they once were and how it can aid them in their current life. This is how past-life regressions serve as a wonderful accelerator for your spiritual growth.
pastLife.onlineTitle: If my office is far from where you live, an online session is a convenient alternative.
pastLife.onlineDescription: It reduces the time and cost of travel and gives you the opportunity to enjoy the experience in the comfort and privacy of your home.
pastLife.onlineEffective: An online regression is equally effective as one conducted in person. All you need is a quiet, dimly lit room, headphones with a good microphone, and a stable internet connection.

ilyari.title: Ilyari: Embodied Light
ilyari.intro: Ilyari is a unique personal healing modality that flows through me as spontaneous body movement.
ilyari.paragraph1: As the healing lightcodes flow through my channel, the body movements distribute them where they are needed most: whether to ease your physical symptom, release emotional stagnation, or recalibrate and upgrade your entire energy field into greater harmony.
ilyari.paragraph2: These transmissions are deeply felt and intuitively guided. Not choreographed, not rehearsed, but received in the moment as a direct transmission of light.
ilyari.lineagesIntro: The healing you receive through Ilyari is woven from star lineages braided through my soul stream, expressed as a unique movement dialect. It carries the frequencies of:

lineage1.title: Lyran-Vegan Flame Spiral Codex
lineage1.description: a sacred geometry that restores your body to a living resonance and coherence field.

lineage2.title: Sirian B Liquid Light Currents
lineage2.description: soft, fluid codes that recalibrate and soothe, singing your auric field back into harmonic balance.

lineage3.title: Arcturian Geometric Code Streaming
lineage3.description: intelligent light patterns that "write" or "etch" into the quantum field around you, encoding your true essence remembrance and renewal into your being.

ilyari.sessionsDescription: Each Ilyari session is a live, channeled transmission of healing light that unfolds in its own timing. Most sessions last 20â€“30 minutes and conclude naturally when the energetic work is complete.
ilyari.sessionsNote: If more healing is called for beyond that point, I seal the field with the appropriate codes, and we'll explore next steps together (such as continuing the process in a follow-up session).

animals.title: Healing for
animals.intro: Many of us see our animals as true family, so it's only natural we want them to be happy, vibrant, and physically well.
animals.description: If your pet or any other domesticated animal is facing health or behavioral challenges, the Emotion Code, Body Code, and Ilyari transmissions can offer gentle and effective support.
animals.note: I can work with your four-legged, two-legged, or no-legged companion as long as you are their rightful owner.

detailLabels.ctaWhatsappMessage: Hello! I'm requesting a quote for

hero.title: About Me
hero.question: What happens when a psychologist understands your unconscious and transforms it into a brand that connects?

profile.name: Luis Virrueta
profile.title: Psychologist of the Unconscious
profile.mainBio: I currently live in Europe. I have worked with hundreds of patients in Mexico and various European cities. In each case, I discovered the same thing: what contemporary scientists are discovering was already known by ancient sages.
profile.card1Desc: Bruce Lipton talks about epigenetics. The Chinese called this Shen-Qi 3,000 years ago. Daniel Kahneman describes cognitive biases. Buddhists called them Vipallasa 2,500 years ago.
profile.card2Desc: Einstein said time is an illusion. The Greeks knew it: AIÃ“N is eternal time where everything coexists simultaneously, not as linear sequence.
profile.card3Desc: Lipton's epigenetics, Davidson's neuroplasticity, Kahneman's biases: everything converges on what Hermes, Buddha and the Greeks already understood about consciousness.
profile.philosophy: We are not discovering anything new. We are remembering what, in AIÃ“N, we have always known. The unconscious filters that create your reality can transform when you understand how they operate.

journey.title: My Journey
journey.subtitle: Each project is the result of years studying how people make decisions, what motivates them, and how to build experiences that transcend the visual.
journey.milestone1Desc: I create a studio that fuses Jungian psychoanalysis, strategic design and technological development for brands seeking radical differentiation.
journey.milestone2Desc: Training in depth psychology and experience design. I discover that the most powerful brands speak to the unconscious before reason.
journey.milestone3Desc: I specialize in visual identities based on the 12 Jungian archetypes. Over 50 projects transformed with this unique approach.
journey.milestone4Desc: I integrate deep archetypal analysis with artificial intelligence to create brands that anticipate unconscious desires and generate instant emotional connection.

approach.title: My Approach
approach.pillar1Desc: I understand how people make decisions, what motivates them, and how to create experiences that connect emotionally.
approach.pillar2Desc: Every visual element has a purpose. I create identities that not only look good, but communicate and convert.
approach.pillar3Desc: Full development from idea to deployment. React, Node.js, AI and the best tools on the market.

cta.title: Ready to create a brand that transcends?
cta.subtitle: I don't work with everyone. I select projects where I can generate real impact and where there is vision alignment. If you seek radical differentiation, let's talk.

hero.title: Blog
hero.subtitle: Exploring the intersection between graphic design, psychology and technology

seo.title: Branding, Psychology & Design Blog
seo.description: In-depth articles on strategic branding, consumer psychology, neuromarketing, design and digital trends. StoryBrand, Cialdini, neuroscience applied to brands.

post1.title: Design Neuroscience: Why Some Logos Are Unforgettable
post1.excerpt: The science behind iconic logos and how to apply these neurological principles to your brand.

post2.title: Generative AI in Design: From Prompt to Emotion
post2.excerpt: How to merge artificial intelligence, visual design and psychology to create experiences that emotionally connect with your audience.

post3.title: Mind-Reading Interfaces: Empathetic UX with Machine Learning
post3.excerpt: Discover how ML and user psychology come together to create interfaces that anticipate needs and adapt experiences in real time.

post4.title: The Psychology of Color in Luxury Branding
post4.excerpt: Discover how premium brands use color theory to create deep emotional connections with their audience.

post5.title: Design Trends 2025: Maximalist Minimalism
post5.excerpt: The new paradigm that combines structural simplicity with rich details and complex sensory experiences.

post6.title: Your Customer is the Hero, Not Your Brand: The StoryBrand Framework
post6.excerpt: Discover how to transform your branding strategy by applying the 7 elements of Donald Miller's StoryBrand Framework and turn your customers into the protagonists of your story.

post7.title: Pre-Suasion: Win the Sale Before Your Customer Knows They Want to Buy
post7.excerpt: Discover the power of context and timing in branding. How the most successful brands prepare their audience's mind to say "yes" before presenting their offer.

post8.title: The 6 Weapons of Persuasion: How to Apply Them to Your Brand
post8.excerpt: Robert Cialdini's scientific principles of influence applied to branding. Reciprocity, commitment, social proof, authority, liking and scarcity explained with practical strategies.

post9.title: Creating Memorable Brand Identities
post9.excerpt: A step-by-step system to develop brands that resonate emotionally and remain in the consumer's mind.

post10.title: The Choice Paralysis: Why Your Menu of 20 Services Is Killing Your Sales
post10.excerpt: The jam experiment that changed marketing forever. Discover why fewer options generate more conversions and how simplifying your offer can multiply your sales.
